Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine red-brown. Rectangular stamp with club symbol.
Type series: KT120 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Pencil '41'. Possible ink number. Names, Menekrates, Anaxandros.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (304)
